front.title: Link Management Protocol (LMP) Test Messages Extensions for Evolutive Optical Transport Networks (OTN)

abstract.t: This document specifies Link Management Protocol (LMP) extensions forthe support of enhanced Optical Transport Networks (OTN). Inparticular it updates LMP test messages detailing the ITU-T G.709 OTNtechnology specific information and extends them in order to coveralso recently introduced signal types and containers defined by theITU-T.
